title: virAli malai
sahitya:
virAli malai vAsanE vIrak-kumarEshanE parAmukhamAi inrum irAdE enniDam


anupallavi

  parAparamE undan bhaktan yAn tollai urAmal irundu vara uru tuNai puriyumaiyA


caraNam    vEru tuNai yEruminri pAril pala pADu paTTu sOrumpOdu aDiyEn kOrum tuNai tArumaiyA 
sIraDi unadait-tEDi sErumis-siiyanai nI Ariru karangaLAl aNaindaruL kUrumaiyA
